snippet: David Wright and the Mets made his contract extension official, and the team’s attention turned to filling its many holes.
abstract: New York Mets hold press conference announce their new contract with third baseman David Wright.
lead_paragraph: David Wright and the Mets made his contract extension official, and the team’s attention turned to filling its many holes.

headline.seo: With David Wright’s Deal Done, Mets Now Need a Team
headline.main: With Wright’s Deal Done, Mets Now Need a Team
headline.print_headline: With Wright’s Deal Done, Mets Now Need a Team
